website_summaries.verdict: The KEEN Newport mainly had positive feedback. Users appreciated its comfortable interior, durable build and snug fit. The sandal impressed buyers because it needed zero break-in time, had decent looks and excellent waterproofness. While there were features liked by consumers, its hefty weight and inability to dry quickly brought disappointment.In conclusion, all the necessary benefits can be enjoyed upon owning this KEEN product.
pros: According to the majority, the Newport from KEEN is the most comfortable pair they have ever owned
Many buyers commented that the sandals were highly durable and therefore could easily last a decade
A lot of individuals admired the snug fit of the KEEN Newport since it prevented uncomfortable chafing or sliding of the foot from inside the sandal
Several consumers mentioned that the footwear, owing to its well-thought-out waterproof build, could be worn while hiking through rivers and streams
A few hikers mentioned that it needed no break-in time and could be used straight out of the box
Some users liked the overall look and colorways of the KEEN Newport sandals
cons: Some buyers thought that these sandals were too heavy
The Newport took a long time to dry up after getting soaked, according to a handful of owners

customer_reviews.title: The best sandals bar none.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of Keen Newport sandals. I live in these in the summer months. The first pair lasted about 6 years and were looking a bit ratty and unbelievably, someone stole them!!!!. The reason I wear them so much is the toecap. It's so easy to stub your toes in ordinary sandals. Also, buy your normal shoe size, they don't take much breaking in.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Randall

customer_reviews.title: What a Great shoe !
customer_reviews.text: To be honest I find I can be very hit and miss with sandals or flip flops , with most either rubbing causing blisters or some discomfort within 30 minutes of wearing , But the Mrs says that's me and I have girls feet lol ..... I've only worn these a few times so it's early days , but once on a 6 mile walk around Cardiff bay and surroundings and so far the best sandals I've ever worn , sturdy well protected whilst still keeping your feet cool also in comfort easily 5* Their a bit Pricey lets hope the durability lives up to the cost ....
customer_reviews.author: Paul Williams

customer_reviews.title: Greatest Hiking Sandal Ever !
customer_reviews.text: I discovered these many years ago and have found them to be the most comfortable long term sandals around. I live in this type of footwear and this is the 4th pair I have purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Sproson

customer_reviews.title: Great summer sandals!
customer_reviews.text: I've always used Teva sandals before but saw these in a shop and decided they were better than the equivalent Teva model. The sole is much thicker, and the rear does not rub my damaged Achilles tendon. So, as usual, I ordered them from Amazon at a (slight) reduction and they arrived next day. Wore them on holiday walking, getting on and off boats in Oslo fjord, walking in water, and for general use since I forgot I had them on. They are treated with an anti-bacterial agent so hopefully they will not start to stink like my Tevas, which are now consigned to the outdoors for storage and only used when my wife isn't around!
customer_reviews.author: Setter man

customer_reviews.title: Ideal combination of shoe and sandal
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy sandal, coming up to size or maybe just a bit smaller than usual. Bevelled heel which I could feel at first when taking strides, but now a few weeks later I do not notice. Think I will love these as a compromise between breathable and light sandal verses toe protection of a shoe
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: I forget they are on my feet
customer_reviews.text: Came across these in a sale in New England which never left my feet since. Realising I really need an outdoor pair and an indoor pair I was glad to find them at a reasonable price here in the UK. So easy to slip on and off no velcro, laces or buckles, good toe protection and so comfortable I forget they are on my feet. Brilliant.
customer_reviews.author: A Cactus

customer_reviews.title: Excellent rough-walking sandals. Recommended.
customer_reviews.text: VERY happy: have scrambled up & down cliffs in West Wales already (and been in the sea...rinsed afterwards as they are partly leather). Good for running short distances (not tried longer!) and did a 6 mile muddy hike with no problem. Nice wide fit and a thicker, more supportive sole than the other Keen sandals I tried. The build quality is good too: should last several years of hard wear, with luck. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with these robust sandles
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with these robust sandles. Well worth the money. Tried on several other premium brands at around the £80 mark and nothing came close. Suprising amount of adjustment available via the lace system pulling in the stretchy neoprene which sits below the leather. Took a few wears to break in as i could feel the stitching against my heels but no problems now. My go to shoes even if its a bit wet. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Buy
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely delighted by these walking sandals, they are unbelievably comfortable a real quality product. They are by far the best Walking Sandals I have bought and well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: SAFC1973

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: bought these for my husband, he finds it difficult to find shoes that fit well. He says they feel very comfy but they did make his feet sore after a long time wearing them
customer_reviews.author: G. Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: They were recommended to other family members who found them really comfortable ...
customer_reviews.text: They were recommended to other family members who found them really comfortable and light weight. highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: DHW

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Well made and comfortable. I would have no problem using these for summer hiking.
customer_reviews.author: Deco

customer_reviews.title: excellent sandals
customer_reviews.text: I had a pair of Keen sandals for 5 years which I finally needed to replace. This pair is a new version of that old favourite. So I knew it would be good. And it is. These sandals fit perfectly. They are lightweight and very comfortable. They support your feet admirably. They make you feel that maybe summer really is here...
customer_reviews.author: S M D'Evelyn

customer_reviews.title: Love these sandals. On my third pair of Newport's
customer_reviews.text: Newport sandals last forever and can take a fair bit of abuse. Very comfortable, even for long hikes (10 miles+).
customer_reviews.author: Paul O'Neill

customer_reviews.title: Really good  sandals
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with my purchase,really comfortable to wear .Good price, fast delivery,and exactly what was advertised.
customer_reviews.author: alan kelly

customer_reviews.title: The product is excellent However, although the manufacturer advised in advance the ...
customer_reviews.text: The product is excellent However, although the manufacturer advised in advance the product is running 1/2 size to small, it was still rather tight when ordering a larger size to compensate.
customer_reviews.author: PaulW

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Sandals !
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable and well made sandals. These sandals really fit like a glove on your feet thanks to the brilliant footbed which moulds to the shape of your feet. . They are also fully adjustable thanks to the speed lacing system when your feet swell on a hot day ! You can also take them into water without any problem the nubuck being waterproof . The soles have a good grip and support you well on long treks. They also have the patent Keen toe protector for climbing any rocky paths
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Scotland

customer_reviews.title: A brilliantly designed product.
customer_reviews.text: I have walked thousands of miles in one pair of these sandals, just starting on my 2nd pair. I suffered from sweaty feet after a long day's walking and thought I would try a pair. Simply perfect, the bumper keeps most of the small stones out and they have the grip of a walking shoe. Obviously better in dry conditions, I usually walk in warm countries. I even used them on the GR20 in Corsica, going against the guides wishes, but didn't have a problem. Buy a pair, brilliant.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C.

customer_reviews.title: Keen Sandals are the best!
customer_reviews.text: I loved my old Keen sandals but it was finally time for a new pair. These are a terrific colour and a perfect fit for my feet. Long walks over various terrains are a breeze with these sandals. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ross

product_meta.title: Keen Men's Newport Hiking Sandals
product_meta.description: Go back to the basics with the sandal that started it all. The footbed conforms to your foot's shape for personalised comfort, and the rubber toe offers protection for adventures in and out of the water. Technologies: ● Keen.Protect can a sandal protect your toes? The answer is yes. The reason is Keen patented toe protection where the shoe outsoles wrap up and over the toes for ultimate protection. ● metatomical footbed design: this internal support mechanism is anatomically engineered to provide excellent arch support and cradle the natural contours of the foot. Features: ● multi directional lug pattern for increased traction ● razor siping for improved ground traction ● secure fit lace capture system ● tpu stability shank ● washable waterproof leather upper. Material: washable waterproof leather upper; non-marking rubber outsole with razor siping; compression molded eva midsole; hydrophobic mesh lining; microfibre insoles cover.
feature_bullets: Sport sandal featuring quick-draw bungee lacing system and patented toe guard
